Text: -  Employers are coming to terms (sometimes with legal prodding) with the fact that it's not just mothers who need parental leave. Fathers do, too. Exhibit A is JPMorgan Chase, which recently settled a paternity leave case for $5 million.
Cause: -  Employers are coming to terms (sometimes with legal prodding) with the fact that it's not just mothers who need parental leave.
Effect: Exhibit A is JPMorgan Chase, which recently settled a paternity leave case for $5 million.
Sentence: <e1>-  Employers are coming to terms (sometimes with legal prodding) with the fact that it's not just mothers who need parental leave.</e1> Fathers do, too. <e2>Exhibit A is JPMorgan Chase, which recently settled a paternity leave case for $5 million.</e2>
